title: Why My Sister-in-law Comes Out of There
overview: Mi-na, a female college student who lives with her sister, secretly works in a bar as a part-timer to buy luxury goods.  Mi-na, who goes to the bar as usual, greets her brother-in-law as a guest in the room and leaves as if running away. Mi-na asks her sister to keep her secret and seduces her brother-in-law...
